name: ScienCentral
tag_list: science-news, science-videos, science-blog, science-central, health-video, space, environment, technology, brain-psychology
overview:
ScienCentral, Inc. is a production company that was co-founded in 1996 by scientist and CEO/President Eliene Augenbraun to increase the number and quality of science stories broadcast to the public. They produce science and technology content for television, the web, and corporate clients, in addition to working with museums and educational publishers to develop multimedia educational products.

ScienCentral’s independent news bureau produces several features per week that air on ABC Newsâ€™ local TV affiliates, each reaching over two million Americans on average. ScienCentral News specializes in short-format (1 to 2 minute) news videos that explain the latest science and technology research in a way that everyday people can understand and relate to their lives and world. All stories are reported by staff journalists whose focus is to cover interesting research that was recently published in peer-reviewed scientific journals.

ScienCentral offers a full range of production and post production services.
